title: DeepSeek R1 Just Revolutionized AI Forever
description:
DeepSeek JUST released a new open source reasoning LLM, R1. This model is insanely powerful - on par and in some cases even BETTER than OpenAI's o1, and there are even local variations you can run yourself that are on par with o1-mini. Absolutely incredible!

With DeepSeek R1, bolt.diy (our open source AI coding assistant) is literally better than Lovable, and I've NEVER been able to say that before R1. In this video, I show you what you can build with R1, and I'm sure your mind will be blown just like mine was.

I also show you how to run DeepSeek R1 locally both through Ollama and HuggingFace. Lot of value packed in a shorter video!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Check out bolt.diy here (installation instructions also here):

https://bolt.diy

And join our bolt.diy community over in the oTTomator Think Tank!

https://thinktank.ottomator.ai

FULL prompt that I used with R1 and Claude 3.5 Sonnet:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_PEa20LjjeJuOfVSReyy18oCz_nNw4Tp__nGbKYn4PE/

DeepSeek R1 Announcement Post:

https://api-docs.deepseek.com/news/news250120

Reddit Benchmark for DeepSeek R1:

https://www.reddit.com/r/LocalLLaMA/comments/1i5q6b9/deepseekr1_and_distilled_benchmarks_color_coded

Install DeepSeek R1 through Ollama or HuggingFace:

https://ollama.com/library/deepseek-r1
https://huggingface.co/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-R1

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Introducing DeepSeek R1
01:13 - DeepSeek R1 Performance and Overview
05:57 - Running R1 Locally - Ollama
08:58 - Running R1 Locally - HuggingFace
06:36 - Prompt for Lovable (Full Explanation)
10:53 - bolt.diy + R1 - the Ultimate Combo
12:12 - The Prompt for bolt.diy + R1
14:25 - Building an App with R1
18:36 - Building an App with Claude 3.5 Sonnet
20:28 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT!
